full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED KYI SGRUB THABS BSDUS PA NYON MONGS MUN SEL NAM MKHA'I NOR BU ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @014B (ZHES DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED KYI SGRUB THABS BSDUS PA NYON MONGS MUN SEL NAM MKHA'I NOR BU ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, STOBS KYI @015A *, ,'KHOR LOS BSGYUR BA CHING GIS RGYAL PO'I GDUNG RGYUD DU 'KHRUNGS SHING DANG STOBS DAD LDAN PA GSUNG RAB BANG GI SRAS BU DPON PO DPAL LDAN DANG, SHES RAB DANG DPA' RTZAL DAD STOBS DANG LDAN PA DPON PO NOR BU BSTAN 'DZIN, GZHAN YANG DON GNYER CAN MANG POS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, LHA'I BTZUN PA SU MA TI MA nI PRADZNY'AS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI SANGGHA BHA DRA'O, ,'DIS KYANG KUN MKHYEN RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA SPYI DANG, KHYAD PAR DU KHAMS GSUM CHOS KYI RGYAL PO BTZONG KHA PA CHEN PO'I MDO SNGAGS KYI BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PA DANG, 'GRO KUN 'JAM PA'I DBYANGS KYI GO 'PHANG MYUR DU 'THOB PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
author_simple: SU MA TI MA nI PRADZNY'A,
